name: WitchTempo
description:
⭐ WitchTempo ⭐

===== Summary =====

Title:  WitchTempo

Genre: Rhythm game

Theme: Potion making, general Touhou theme musics

===== Story =====

The secret of the Hourai Elixir is leaked! The key is imbruing potion making with music. In Gensokyo, potions are the hype!

You will start making potions until you find the golden recipe for making the Hourai Elixir! No doubt you will come across a lot of different potions along the way, and surely there will be a lot of buyers $$$$$.

Make a potion for your own desire! Make the Hourai Elixir and achieve immortality!

===== Game play =====

This game is a rhythm game, so there are music games to be played! Match the rhythm, and press the right keys to drop the ingredient to the pot! The better your score, the better the reward! Achieve the magical FULL COMBO for potential hidden rewards!

===== Controls =====

Z = Red Fairy

X = Green Fairy

Please note the keys are customizable through the Settings menu.

===== A big big thank to these wonderful jammers with making this game <3 =====

Jochi
